title: Hong Kong Government Spending
description: Government Spending in Hong Kong decreased to 93994 HKD Million in the third quarter of 2022 from 95509 HKD Million in the second quarter of 2022. Government Spending in Hong Kong averaged 42525.84 HKD Million from 1973 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 100575 HKD Million in the first quarter of 2022 and a record low of 8315 HKD Million in the second quarter of 1973. Government Spending refers to public expenditure on goods and services and is a major component of the GDP. Government spending policies like setting up budget targets, adjusting taxation, increasing public expenditure and public works are very effective tools in influencing economic growth. This page provides - Hong Kong Government Spending - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Census and Statistics Department, Hong Kong
